Professional practice 
 Consult general corporate issues such as: work permits, licensing, post-licensing, labors, drafting 
certain types of commercial contracts, real estate projects, litigation 
 Consult matters related to international sales contracts for domestic companies 
Exemplary legal cases engaged 
 Advising a domestic manufacturing company in Ho Chi Minh City in its international purchase 
contracts for purchasing technological lines manufacturing steel from a Chinese supplier (including 
drafting the international purchase contracts) 
 Advising and representing a big Korean real estate developer in setting up a joint venture company 
engaging in real estate businesses in Vietnam (including drafting charter, joint venture agreement) in 
compliance with Vietnam's WTO accession 
 Advising a domestic real estate company in its loan from an offshore company to fund its acquisition 
of shares in another domestic real estate company (including drafting loan agreement/ reviewing the 
shareholders' agreement/ drafting the share pledge contract, etc.)  
 Advising a foreign pharmaceutical company in regulatory issues in respect of its distribution and 
circulation of MIMS publications among Vietnamese doctors 
 Advising and representing a foreign-owned hotel company located in Ho Chi Minh City in its 
application for investment incentives applicable to foreign-invested companies 
 Advising a domestic company located in Ho Chi Minh City in its joint venture with a foreign real estate 
company for developing a complex and commercial center in Ho Chi Minh City 
 Advising a foreign-invested paint manufacturing company in disputes with domestic companies 
involving sales contract 
 Engaging in due diligence works for a foreign bank in acquiring shares in a domestic foods 
processing company
